title: Capston sources!
content: Any sources or links to go through previous year capstone projects/publications so that we can get a rough idea on what approach and what kind of projects are expected.

comments.body: If you have good contacts of Seniors, you can request them to send their paper, published in any X conference. Or else, you may ask in the library ig
This was posted on PESU Discord a year ago. If you ask there someone might be able to send it to you.

Ask people who are outside, dont do what was done last year or IEEE explorer. 

Based on the skill of the 2 active members think evaluate ask around and finalized. And please dont make a HYPOTHETICAL problem and jump on solving them you'll have hard time defending it to "good" journal/teacher/interviewers.
